about_the_game:
Dreeg is a groundbreaking Metroidvania adventure that immerses you in a sci-fi fantasy world where reality is not what it seems. Harness the power to shift between three parallel dimensions at will, unlocking new paths, solving intricate puzzles, and facing fierce enemies across a sprawling, interconnected world.

Dimension-shifting Gameplay


Master the unique ability to traverse between three distinct dimensions. Each version of the world presents its own challenges, secrets, and opportunities for discovery. Seamlessly switch dimensions to outmaneuver enemies, solve complex puzzles, and explore hidden areas.

Unique Abilities


Unlock Dreeg's potential with dual-purpose combat and defensive abilities that help unlock pathways and secrets throughout the world.

Dynamic Combat System


Equip Dreeg with the Pulsar Forge, a versatile weapon system that transforms between the rapid Radial Blade, the precise Energy Blaster, and the powerful Dire Blade. Upgrade your weapons to unleash devastating combos and unlock special abilities that suit your playstyle.

Engaging storyline


Follow Dreeg on a quest to avenge his fallen companion, Mayana, and thwart the plans of the mad scientist Xel'Xan while discovering the dark secrets of this strange new world.

Character customization

Enhance Dreeg’s capabilities by upgrading the Pulsar Suit. Collect energy shards scattered throughout the dimensions to boost your health, defense, speed, and weapon potency. Tailor your abilities to overcome the toughest challenges and become the ultimate protector.

immersive World

Step into a beautifully crafted universe teeming with wonder and mystery. From desolate deserts and dark caverns to futuristic cities and mystical forests, each environment is richly detailed and filled with lore. Unravel the secrets of this planet and the multiverse through captivating storytelling and environmental exploration.

Atmospheric Soundtrack

Enjoy a dynamic and adaptive soundtrack that enhances the atmosphere of each dimension. The music evolves with your journey, intensifying during battles and providing a hauntingly beautiful backdrop during exploration.

Join the Adventure!


Dive into the multi-dimensional world of Dreeg and become the hero the multiverse needs.

short_description: Dreeg is a multi-dimensional Metroidvania adventure. Shift between three parallel dimensions to explore, solve puzzles, and battle fierce enemies. Upgrade your Pulsar Suit and Forge to unlock unique abilities. Unravel the mysteries, avenge your fallen companion, and save the multiverse.
